Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: laidlec
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights furnishings amenities outdated didnt plan spending time opted basic accommodations biggest complaint fear lack cleanliness dark hairs sitting bathroom counter dark flecks crumbs pulled sheets stain inside quilt cold night toilet didnt flush properly bright staff helpful friendly stay recommend spending little extra cash clean stay
